90776.「へっ。待ってたぜ <pc>！\n とうとう ガンガン電池の充電が終わった！\n:
Hey! Been waitin' for ya, <pc>!
That Boomin' Battery's finally done chargin'!
Now we can blast to the moon!

90777.「お久しぶりです カンダタ子分Ａさん！\n おや……ますます 子分Ａっぷりに\n:
Good to see you again, Merry Man A!
You're looking even more merry since
the last time I saw you.

90778.「すでに 無職の私が キラキラ大風車塔から\n ガンガン電池を 持ってきてありま:
As an umemployed individual, I have already
brought the Booming Battery from the windmill!
I'm feeling much more merry myself, too.

90779.「おい。ごたくはいいから さっさと\n ビッグホルンを 改造しやがれ！！:
Oi! Enough wif the chit-chat! Get to work
on that horn alre'y!

90780.「わあっ 待ってください！\n 今すぐに とりかかりますからっ！！:
Wah! Please give me just a moment! I'll get
straight to work on it!!

90781.「この ビッグホルンは 私の祖先である\n 建築士プロッペが 設計したもの……\:
Designed by my amazing architect ancestor
Proppe... I'm quite thrilled to be modifying
this Big Horn.

90782.「さあ！\n 無職のチカラを お見せしますよっ！！:
Behold! I'll show you the true power of the
unemployed!!

90783.「……これで ホルン本体の改造は終了です。\n あとは 最後の決め手である\n:
...and that's all for the modifications. All
that's left is to attach the Booming Battery.
The final step.

90784.「……ガンガン電池くん。\n 毎日 通うべき場所のある幸せを\n 実感できたのは:
Oh, Mr. Booming Battery... It's thanks to you
that I realized how lucky am I to have a
place to visit each day...

90785.「おい！ つべこべ言ってねえで\n さっさと やれってんだ！:
Oi! Enough wif the sappy stuff! 'urry up an'
get on wif it!

90789.「おおっ！ ホルンが振動を始めたぞっ！？: Woah! That big ol' 'orn's shakin' pretty good!

90790.なんと ビッグホルンの出力が\n爆発的に アップした！:
The Big Horn's output is now booming
considerably!

90791.「やりました……無職の勝利です！！\n これなら 月へも飛んでいけますよっ！:
I did it...! Victory to the unemployed!!
You'll definitely be able to fly to the moon
now!

90792.「でかした ペリポン！\n よーし。それじゃあ さっそく……:
Ya really pulled through, Peripon!
Awright. Let's get a move on...

90793.「<pc>！\n テメーが 先に 乗り込むんだ！:
<pc>!
I fink you should go in first!

90794.「この間みてえに 壁に激突しちゃあ かなわん。\n まずは 子分のテメーが 試せ:
I don't really feel like crashin' head first
into a wall again. You're one o' me Merry Men,
so you gotta go first!<yesno><close>

90795.「うるせえ！ つべこべ言わずに\n ビッグホルンに 乗り込むんだっ！！\n 親分:
Wot was that now?! Yer gonna get in that 'orn,
and yer gonna do it NOW! I'm yer leader, so
ya gotta listen! Got it?!<yesno><close>

90796.「よしきた！\n それじゃあ <pc>。\n とっとと ビッグホルンに 乗り込み:
Good answer! Okay, <pc>.
Climb up in there!

90797.「いってらっしゃい カンダタ子分Ａさん！: See you soon, Merry Man A!

90798.なんと <pc>は 月に到着した！:
<pc> has successfully landed on the
moon!

90799.「おや……カンダタ子分Ａさん。\n 親分さんなら 急に お腹が痛くなったとかで\:
Oh, Merry Man A...it's you. Mr. Robbin' 'Ood
got a pretty bad stomach ache and ran
off somewhere.

90800.「ささっ カンダタ親分さんが\n 戻ってくる前に どうぞ ビッグホルンへ！:
Quickly, before he comes back. Climb into the
Big Horn!

90801.「いってらっしゃい カンダタ子分Ａさん！: See you soon, Merry Man A!

90802.なんと <pc>は 月に到着した！:
<pc> has successfully landed on the
moon!

90804.「あなた様にかけられた 邪悪な術を\n 打ち消す薬が ようやく 手に入りました。:
I've at last procured some medicine that will
counteract the evil magic that has been cast
on you. Please take this...

90806.「いやな音……。\n いったい どこから聞こえてくるのかしら？\n 不気味ですわ:
What an awful noise... Just where is it coming
from? It's quite eerie...

90807.「我ハ 監視者……チチチッ。\n 姫 目覚メテハ ナラヌ。薬ヲ ヨコセ！！:
I AM THE OBSERVER... Click, click.
THE PRINCESS MUST NOT AWAKEN.
ADMINISTER THE MEDICINE TO ME!

90809.「チチチチッ……邪魔者ハ 排除スル！！:
Click, click... ANY OBSTRUCTION SHALL BE
ELIMINATED!!

90810.「チチチッ。\n 薬モ 邪魔者モ……スベテ 排除スル！！:
Click, click, click...
THE MEDICINE AND THE OBSTRUCTION...
ALL MUST BE ELIMINATED!!

90812.「チチチ…チ……。\n 戦闘機能……低下……。\n 任務 シッパイ……チチ……チ:
Click...click...
COMBAT FUNCTION... DECLINING...
MISSION... FAILURE... Click... Click...

90814.「よかった……。\n これで カグヤ＝ムーン様を\n 目覚めさせることができます:
Thank goodness...
Now I can wake up Mistress Moon.

90815.「姫様……カグヤ＝ムーン様。\n さあ この薬を お飲みください……。:
Mistress Moon... Here, please take this
medicine...

90816.セレスは カグヤ＝ムーンに\nインベジウムから作った薬を 飲ませた！:
Ceres administers medicine made from Invadium
to Mistress Moon!

90819.「イテテテテ……。\n チッ ペリポンの野郎め。\n もうちょっと マシな場所に:
O...ouch... Peripon, ya little punk...
Ya couldn't have sent me someplace
a little bit less painful?!

90821.「なんでえ！ 言いたいことがあるなら\n はっきり言いやがれっ！:
'ey, you! If ya got somethin' to say, then
just spit it out!

90822.「これは 失礼を……。\n わらわは カグヤ＝ムーン。\n この月を統べる女王…:
I apologize... my name is Mistress Moon.
I am the queen who rules over this moon...

90823.「どなたかは存じませぬが\n わらわを お助けくださったこと……\n まこと 感:
I know not who you are, but I am truly
grateful to you for saving my life.

90824.「へっ？ なんの話でい！？\n 俺様は……: Eh? Whad'ya talkin' about? I'm not...

90825.「おう <cs_pchero>！\n テメーも ここに着いてたのかっ！\n さす:
Oh, <cs_pchero>!
So yer here, too! Ya really are one of me
Merry Men!

90826.「まあ……こちらの 勇敢なお方は\n あなた様の 従者なのですか？:
So...if I may ask, is this brave person here
your servant?

90827.「おう！ この 大盗賊カンダタ様の\n 最強の子分 <cs_pchero>だ！\:
Right-o! I, the greatest thief Robbin' 'Ood,
got the best 'enchman there! Their name's
<cs_pchero>! Ya'd best not forget!

90829.「……この月は 平和な楽園であったが\n ある時から 侵略者どもに襲われ\n か:
This moon was once a peaceful paradise.
But then those invaders appeared, and now
this place is in total shambles...

90830.「月から立ち去るよう 説得に行った\n わらわを 侵略者の王は 邪悪な術で\n:
When I tried to convince them to leave here,
their king put me into an eternal slumber
using some kind of evil magic...

90831.「……姫を目覚めさせる薬と 引き替えに\n 全面的に 降伏せよ。\n 次に来ると:
"In exchange for the medicine that will awaken your princess, you must surrender to us. You have until our next arrival to decide." Those
were his words...

90832.「もはや これまで……と思いましたが\n <cs_pchero>様と カンダタ様:
I thought...it was over for us. But thanks to
<cs_pchero> and Robbin' 'Ood here,
you were able to awaken.

90833.「……カンダタ様 お聞きくだされ。\n この月には 伝説がございます。:
Listen to me carefully, Robbin' 'Ood.
There exists a legend about this moon.

90834.「月が 存亡の危機に陥ったとき\n 異世界より 救世主が現れる……と。:
"When the moon faces the danger of total
extinction, a savior from another world would
reveal themselves..."

90835.「言い伝えによれば その救世主の姿は……: The legend says that the savior has...

90836.「雄々しき素顔を 覆面に隠し……: ...a heroic face hidden by a mask...

90837.「……そう カンダタ様。\n あなた様と うりふたつなのです。:
That's right, Robbin' 'Ood. You and the savior
are the same.

90839.「お願いいたします。\n カンダタ様……どうか 月をお救いくだされ！:
Robbin' 'Ood... I'm begging you.
You must save the moon!

90842.「そいつらと 戦って\n 俺様に なんの得があるってんだ！！\n お断りだぜ！:
What do I gain from fightin' 'em, anyway?!
I fink I'll pass!

90843.「……無論 お礼は なんなりと。\n そう。もし月を お救いくださるならば\n:
Of course, I will show my gratitude to you
however you like... If you can save the moon,
then I will give you the Treasure of the Moon.

90844.「月の秘宝だとっ！？: Treasure o' the Moon, ya say?!

90845.「そういうことなら 話は別だ！\n どこの どいつだって ブチのめしてやるぜ！\:
If that's the case, then now we're talkin'!
So who do I gotta pummel?! I don't care who
it is! Ain't that right, <cs_pchero>?!

90846.「で その 侵略者の王ってのは\n どこにいるんでい。さっさと言え！:
And where's this king o' the invaders ya were
blabbin' about? Lemme at 'em!

90847.「きゃつらは 遠い 空の彼方に……。\n されど わらわが目覚めたと知れば\n:
The invaders are far away in space...
Though if they know I am awake, then
they will come back very soon.

90849.カンダタは カグヤ＝ムーンから\nカグヤの首飾りを もらった！:
Robbin' 'Ood received the Mistress' Necklace
from Mistress Moon!

90850.「その首飾りがあれば いつでも\n わらわと 話をすることができまする。:
With that necklace, you and I can speak with
one another at any time.

90851.「侵略者どもが 現れたなら\n すぐに お呼びいたします……。\n どうか……月:
If the invaders show themselves again, we
will call for you here immediately. Please...
you must help us save the moon.

90852.「ふん……くれるモンなら もらっとくぜ！:
Hmph... If yer givin' it to me, then I'd be a
bloke not to take it!

90853.「よしっ <cs_pchero>！\n 今は 月の秘宝は手に入らねぇらしいな。\:
Right-o, <cs_pchero>!
Looks like we can't get that treasure right
now. Let's 'ead back to Orphea!

90855.「ご心配なく 救世主カンダタ様。 \n 外にある 不思議な渦が あなた様の故郷へ:
Worry not, savior Robbin' 'Ood. The portal
outside should lead you back home.

90856.「ほお 便利だな。\n よーし <cs_pchero>！\n 俺様について来な！:
Talk about convenient. Awright!
Come on, <cs_pchero>!
Follow me!

90857.「カンダタ親分さん カンダタ子分Ａさん！\n どっ どこから現れたんですか！？:
Mr. Robbin' 'Ood! Merry Man A!
W...when did you get here?!

90858.「おう。どういう仕組みか わからねえが\n とにかく 月から 戻ってきたぜ！:
'ello. Not really sure 'ow, but we're back
from the moon!

90859.「おおっ！ では 私の改造は大成功ですね！\n これで 世界中に\n 無職のチカ:
Ooooh! Then that means my modifications were
a success! Finally, the world will know the
true power of the unemployed!

90860.「しかし まいったぜ……。\n 月まで行ったってのに お宝はおあずけだ。\n ま:
But, dang it all... Went all the way to the
moon, an' the treasure's a no-go. Oh, well.
Just gotta wait fer a bit.

90861.「<cs_pchero>！\n ひとまず ご苦労だったな。\n 俺様のヘソクリか:
<cs_pchero>!
Ya did good this time. Here's somethin'
outta me own pocket!

90862.「いいか。テメーには 侵略者との戦いでも\n ちゃーんと 働いてもらうぜ！\n:
Listen! Those invaders are gonna be tough!
Ya better sharpen yer skills before we fight
'em!

90863.「カンダタ親分さん！\n 私には お駄賃は ないんですか！？\n 子分差別は い:
Mr. Robbin' 'Ood! Don't you have any reward
for me, too? You can't leave out one of your
own henchmen!

90864.「ん？ そういや そうだな。\n よーし 俺様のアジトに戻ったら\n 何か くれ:
Hmmm? Come ta tink of it...sure, why not.
Awright, I'll give ya somethin'. Follow me
back to me 'ideout!

90865.「わぁっ ありがとうございます！\n 無職の私に 臨時収入が！:
Woow! Thank you so much! I'm employed AND
have extra income!

90866.「じゃあな <cs_pchero>！\n また 俺様が呼んだら スッ飛んで来いよ:
See ya 'round, <cs_pchero>!
No draggin' yer feet when I call ya!

90867.「またお会いしましょう！\n カンダタ子分Ａさんっ。: See you again soon, Merry Man A!

90868.「おや……カンダタ子分Ａさん。\n また 月世界へ 行きたいんですか？:
Oh, Merry Man A, it's you.
You'd like to go to the moon again?

90869.「いってらっしゃい カンダタ子分Ａさん！: See you soon, Merry Man A!

90870.なんと <pc>は 月に到着した！:
<pc> has successfully landed on the
moon!

93315.「ささっ。それなら どうぞ ビッグホルンへ！: Go on, go on! Get inside the Big Horn!

100326.「オノを振るいし 猛き勇士。: ...and a fierce warrior who wields an axe.

100327.「こっから どうやって帰ればいいんでい！:
How in blazes am I supposed to get back
'ome?!
